protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the last step in the biosynthesis of serine from carbohydrates. The reaction mechanism proceeds via the formation of a phosphoryl-enzyme intermediates.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
serine family amino acid metabolic process

reference.reference_text: Collet JF, Gerin I, Rider MH, Veiga-da-Cunha M, Van Schaftingen E: Human L-3-phosphoserine phosphatase: sequence, expression and evidence for a phosphoenzyme intermediate. FEBS Lett. 1997 May 26;408(3):281-4.
